actions.name: Hunger Switch
actions.description: Effect: At the end of the user's Activations, they will alternate between Full Belly Mode Forme and Hangry Mode Forme. While in Full Belly Mode, consuming a [Food] Item will give +1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 3 Activations. While in Hangry Mode, consuming a [Food] Item will give +1 ATK and SPATK Stages for 3 Activations.
